title: Keanu Reeves to executive produce John Wick female led spin-off in Ballerina, Len Wiseman to direct
text:
The third film in the John Wick franchise opened earlier this year earning $323 million worldwide.

Now Lionsgate is moving forward with an action spinoff, Deadline reported Tuesday, that will center on a young female assassin.

While there is no word on Keanu Reeves' involvement on-screen, he will be an executive producer on the Len Wiseman directed film.

Spin off: Keanu Reeves will executive producer the spinoff Ballerina that will center on a young female assassin.

Basil Iwyank, Erica Lee and Chas Stahleski will also serve as producers.

Ballerina was written on spec by Shay Hattan, who was a writer on John Wick: Chapter 3—Perabellum.

Unity Phelan was in the third installment as Ballerina, though there is no word on who will take the lead role.

Director: Len Wiseman is signed on to direct the spinoff

The news comes after the box office success earlier this year, making the film the highest grossing home entertainment title for Lionsgate in five years. Halle Berry, Kaurence Fishuburne and Asia Kate co-starred.

While Reeves will certainly return as the eponymous title character, along with Stahelski (Reeves' former stunt double on The Matrix) as the director, it remains unclear if other John Wick 3 characters will be back.

There is already a John Wick 4 scheduled to be in theaters May 21, 2021, but there is are no storyline details yet available.

The franchise began in 2014 and collectively has earned $581 million worldwide.

No word on Halle: Halle Berry co-starred in John Wick 3, that earned $323 million worldwide

Director Chad Stahelski said 'John may survive all this s**t, but at the end of it, there’s no happy ending. He’s got nowhere to go,' the director said in another interview with IndieWire.

'How do you f***ing want me to end it? Do you think he’s going to ride off into the f***ing sunset? He’s killed 300 fucking people and he’s just going to [walk away], everything’s okay?' the director added.

'He’s f***ed for the rest of his life. It’s just a matter of time,' Stahelski added.
description:
Lionsgate is moving forward with an action spinoff, Deadline reported Tuesday, that will center on a young female assassin.
Keanue Reeves will executively produce.
